Underwhelming tourist trap.  Nice exterior and nice decor when you walk in with clear display cases that give you a sense of freshness and cleanliness.  That's where the positives end.  Duck on the duck skewers was overdone and greasy; all the salads were greasy with too much mayo and the bread didn't seem fresh.  Would not recommend.. Unless you're the type that needs to order off of a picture menu and has zero sense of what decent food should taste like.  Super disappointing, and a waste of perfectly good stomach space in Barcelona.  Unengaged waitress who didn't seem to enjoy her job much.
